search.query:
index=$DOSE_INDEX$ |
spath AccessionNumber | spath StationName |
eval AccessionNumber = coalesce(Accession, AccessionNumber) | eval StationName = coalesce(Station, StationName) |
spath RequestedProcedureDescription | spath ReferencedRequestSequence{}.RequestedProcedureDescription |
spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Dose (RP) Total" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Dose (RP) Total" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Dose (RP) Total" |
spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Total Fluoro Time" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Total Fluoro Time" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Total Fluoro Time" |
spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Dose Area Product Total" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Dose Area Product Total" | spath "X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Dose Area Product Total" |
lookup $DEVICE_LUT$ StationName OUTPUT InstitutionName Modality Location Manufacturer RPDField Sources | where match(InstitutionName, "$MY_INST$") AND match(StationName, "$MY_STATION$") AND match(Modality, "XA") | eval name=InstitutionName." ".Location." (".Manufacturer.")" |
eval RPD=if(RPDField=="ProcedureDescription", ProcedureDescription, coalesce(RequestedProcedureDescription, 'ReferencedRequestSequence{}.RequestedProcedureDescription')) |
eval vir_dose_raw=if(sourcetype=="csv", 'Dose _mGy', coalesce('X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Dose (RP) Total', 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Dose (RP) Total')) | eval vir_dose=if(sourcetype=="csv", round(vir_dose_raw,3), round(vir_dose_raw*1000,3)) | eval vir_doseB_raw=if(Sources==2, 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Dose (RP) Total', NULL) | eval vir_doseB=round(vir_doseB_raw*1000,3) |
eval vir_fluoro_time_raw=if(sourcetype=="csv", 'FluoroTime _m', coalesce('X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Total Fluoro Time', 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Total Fluoro Time')) | eval vir_fluoro_time=if(sourcetype=="csv", round(vir_fluoro_time_raw,3), round(vir_fluoro_time_raw/60,3)) | eval vir_fluoro_timeB_raw=if(Sources==2, 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Total Fluoro Time', NULL) | eval vir_fluoro_timeB=round(vir_fluoro_timeB_raw/60,3) |
eval vir_dap_raw = if(sourcetype=="csv", 'DAP _cGy_cm2', coalesce('X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data.Dose Area Product Total', 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{0}.Dose Area Product Total')) | eval vir_dap=if(sourcetype=="csv", round(vir_dap_raw*100,3), round(vir_dap_raw*10000,3)) | eval vir_dapB_raw = if(Sources==2, 'X-Ray Radiation Dose Report.Accumulated X-Ray Dose Data{1}.Dose Area Product Total', NULL) | eval vir_dapB=round(vir_dapB_raw*10000,3)
| inputlookup $DEVICE_LUT$ | search Modality="XA" | stats count by InstitutionName
| inputlookup $DEVICE_LUT$ | search Modality="XA" | where match(InstitutionName, "$MY_INST$") | eval name=InstitutionName." ".Location." (".Manufacturer.")" | sort name
